testcase.classname: Verifying the login functionality of Adactin
testcase.name: Successfull login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the adactin login page.....................................passed When User enters the valid "anonym123" and "admin123" and click login.......passed Then Search Hotel page to be displayed......................................passed When User is on search Hotel page enter "Melbourne","Hotel Sunshine","Deluxe","6 - Six","29/12/2020","31/12/2020","3 - Three","2 - Two" details.passed Then click search button....................................................passed When User is on select hotel page select the hotel package..................passed Then click continue.........................................................passed When User is on enter "Greens","Tech","Plot No.19,Balamurugan Garden,OMR Road,Kancheepuram District,Okkiam, Thoraipakkam".passed Then Click BookNow button...................................................passed When user is on Booking Confirmation page verify the details................passed Then click Logout...........................................................passed
